081-12b @#/ /rgya gar skad du/ kro d+ha rA dza sarba man+t+ra gu h+ya tan+t+ra na ma/ bod skad du/ khro bo'i rgyal po thams cad gsang sngags gsang ba'i rgyud ces bya ba/ khro bo mi g.yo mgon po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de nas yang dag bshad bya ba/ /khams gsum zhe sdang can gzigs nas/ /zhe sdang thams cad zad bya'i phyir/ /bcom ldan thugs rje'i rang bzhin can/ /zhe sdang mi g.yo mgon por mdzad/ /ngo bo nyid kyis dag pa'i bdag /sngags dang phyag rgya ting 'dzin dang / /rnam dag bsam gtan 'phrin las rnams/ /bcom ldan rdo rje 'chang chen gyis/ /dur khrod 'bar ba 'khrugs pa'i sar/ /'dzin pas btud de nges zhus la/ /kye kye yang dag khro chen gtso/ /ma lus rnam dag la gnas phyir/ /mgon po mi g.yo'i gsang rgyud las/ /sems dpa' chen po'i ting 'dzin gang / /ngo mtshar thar pa nges par gso/ /de nas yang dag ye gsungs pa/ /dpa' bo dur khrod gnas pas legs/ /rus pa'i rgyan nges phyag rgya drug /gnas pa'i tshogs kyi bdag nyid de/ /rgyu bzhi tshad med bzhi ru gnas/ /ye shes rtog pa'i rtog pa'o/ /rgyun ma chad pa'i dam pa yis/ /nyi zla shes rab thabs kyi gdan/ /sku gsung thugs kyi ngo bor gnas/ /gyur pa'i mtshan ldan ye shes lnga/ /phyag rgya drug mdzes byin brlabs nas/ /dur khrod ma ni 'khyud pa'o/ /phung po la sogs thub par gnas/ /pad+ma rdo rje byin gyis brlabs/ / bsrung ba'i sbyor ba med pa dang / /mtshan ma bral dang 'dus ma byas/ /byed pa rnam med rtog pas 'das/ /sku ni dug 'dzoms gnag pa'i tshul/ /rdo rje zhags pa bsdigs gnas pa/ /g.yon brkyang gnas pa spyan rtsa dmar/ /pad+ma gri gug shes rab tshul/ /g.yon 'khyud tshim byed rgyan bral ba'i/ /thabs dang shes rab ma chags dang / /tha ma byin za mnan te gnas/ /'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus na'o/ /hA+o+uM la rgya gram rdo rje gnas/ /e las chos 'byung grub pa mo/ /mtshon cha ra ba dra bas so/ /rten pa phyag rgya lha lnga gnas/ /mos pa

25
081-13a rnam par grub pa yin/ /mos pa rnam par dag pa'i le'u ste dang po'o// //de nas yang dag bshad bya ba/ /gnyis med 'gyur ba'i gsang ba ni/ /'khor lo mi bskyod ye shes che/ /mgrin pa phreng ba'i rin chen 'byung / /rna cha gzugs kyi 'od dpag med/ / rus pa'i rna rgyan don yod grub/ /thal ba snang mdzad rnam dag go/ /mig la 'dod chags rdo rje ma/ /rna ba zhe sdang ma zhes grags/ /sna ni ser sna'i rnam par bor/ /lce la phrag dog rdo rje ma/ /lus la rdo rje gti mug go/ /yid la chos kyi dbang phyug ste/ /dkyil 'khor lus nyid rnam dag pa/ /rtsa ni thig gi rang bzhin te/ /ka ba brgyad ni rkang brgyad do/ /bdud rtsi rnam lnga tshon sna lnga/ /g.yas g.yon steng 'og sgo nyid de/ /so sen ba spu twa ra Na/ /snying gi dbus kyi lte ba nyid/ /phung po lnga yi gtso mo ste/ /khams dang skye mched lha mor grags/ /'byung ba sgo ba bzhi nyid de/ /'dom gang gru bzhi lham pa ste/ /mi g.yo mgon po rnam par nges/ /lus kyi rnam par dag pa'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o// //oM Ar+ya a tsa la mAr+ya ra ya kro d+ha hA+o+uM phaT/ snying po'o/ /oM Ar+ya a tsa la kro d+ha bi ba ta sa hA+o+uM phaT/ nye ba'i snying po'o/ /oM tsaN+DA ma hA ro Sha Na hA+o+uM phaT/ gsang ba'i snying po'o/ /oM ha/ na ma hi/ swa hA hu/ bau ShaT he/ hA+o+uM hA+o+uM ho/ phaT haM/ rgyan byin gyis brlab pa'o/ /oM pad+ma bo larga mi yaM/ TaM haM maM byAM/ badzra pra ta ka ko la hA+o+uM phaT/ shes rab thabs kyi phyag rgya byin gyis brlab pa'o/ / ka sa mA ra kha na hi mA ra kha ni sa mA ra ya phaT/ bsad pa'i'o/ /sarba a margaM me a hA+o+uM/ thun mong grub pa'o/ /a gats+tsha phaT/ bskrad pa'i 'o/ /swA hA rat+na na/ rgyas pa'i'o/ /d+harmA gu ta hA+o+uM/ dbang gi'o/ /karma pu ta shIn+ta~M ku ru hA+o+uM/ zhi ba'i'o/ /sngags kyi rnam par dag pa'i rtog pa'i dum bu las khro bo'i rgyal po thams cad kyisngags gsang ba'i rgyud ces bya ba las/ 'phags pa mi g.yo ba'i sngags rnam par dag pa'i le'u ste gsum pa'o// //de nas yang dag bshad bya ba/ /yab yum gnyis med sbyor ba las/ /khro bo'i tshogs rnams

26
081-13b spros nas ni/ /gtso mo thabs kyi yan lag bkang / /lag pa g.yas par gshin rje'i gshed/ /g.yon pa gzhan gyis mi thub pa/ /rta mgrin kha la bsam par bya/ /rdo rje la ni bdud rtsi 'khyil/ /dpung pa g.yas par mi g.yo ba/ /g.yon par 'dod pa'i rgyal po'o/ /pus mo g.yas par bsam pa ni/ /dbyig pa sngon po cher 'bar ba/ /pus mo g.yon par stobs po che/ /spyi bor gtsug tor 'khor los sgyur/ /gnod mdzes rgyal po bsam pa ni/ /rkang pa gnyis la dgod par bya/ /yang ni yab yum sbyor ba las/ /byang chub sems sprin 'du 'phro las/ /hU~M tshogs khro mor spros nas ni/ /gtso mo shes rab yan lag dgang / /lag g.yas rdo rje ro langs ma/ /g.yon na gzhan gyis mi thub mo/ /de yi khar ni khro gnyer ma/ /gsang bar ral pa gcig ma'o/ /gzhan yang dpung pa g.yas gnas par/ /de bzhin gshegs yum rdo rje ma/ /g.yon du sna tshogs rin chen gyi/ /phyag rgya dag ni bsgom par bya/ /pus mo g.yas la gnas par yang / /sna tshogs pad+ma de bzhin gshegs/ /g.yon pa las ni sna tshogs las/ /spyi bor nam mkha'i rdo rje ma/ /rkang pa gnyis la sa yi ni/ /sa 'dzin lha mo gzhag par bya/ /thabs dang shes rab sbyor ba yis/ /byang chub sems sprin 'phro 'du las/ /gdod nas grub pa'i sangs rgyas rigs/ /phyung nas lus la dkyil 'khor bkod/ /de dag phan tshun sbyor ba las/ /rjes chags chen po'i sgra yis ni/ /bde gshegs tshogs rnams bskul bya ste/ /de dag la ni yang yang gzhug /oM sarba ta thA ga ta a nu rA ga Na badzra swa b+hA ba At+w+ma ko\u0f85 haM/ chu la zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bzhin/ /gsal ba lha yi rang bzhin ni/ /kun kyang zhal gsum phyag drug ste/ /brjid pa'i khro bo gar dang bcas/ /yang na zhal gcig phyag gnyis par/ /rnal 'byor can gyis brtan par bsgom/ /dngos grub rab mchog thob par 'gyur/ /de phyir nan tan bskyed par bya/ /'phags pa mi g.yo ba'i rtog pa las lus kyi dkyil 'khor bkod pa'i

27
081-14a rim pa'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o// //de nas phyi yi dkyil 'khor du/ /rigs kyi khro bo spro ba ni/ /thabs dang shes rab sbyor ba las/ /rnam par 'phrul pa bshad par bya/ /rang sngags sa bon las byung ba'i/ /gti mug mi g.yo mgon po ni/ / zhal ni gnag dang dkar dang dmar/ /'bar ba'i tshogs kyis rnam par 'khrigs/ /dbyig pa 'khor lo rdo rje bsnams/ /phyag g.yas na ni bsnams par mdzad/ /thugs kar sdigs mdzub zhags pa dang / /dril bu dgra sta g.yon pa ni/ /dbang po la sogs tshogs bcas dang / /mi bzad bgegs ni skrag par mdzad/ /pad+ma nyi ma mnan nas ni/ /shar gyi phyogs su bzhugs gyur pa/ /rnam snang dbu rgyan ldan pa'o/ /rang sngags sa bon las byung ba'i/ /ser sna mi g.yo mgon po ni/ /rin chen 'byung ldan dbu rgyan can/ /gser mdog zhal gsum phyag drug pa/ /spyan gsum gsus che nor bus brgyan/ /ser dang gnag dang dmar ba'i zhal/ /mche ba gtsigs shing rnam par rgyu/ /'bar ba'i tshogs kyis rnam par 'khrigs/ /rdo rje dbyug pa ral gri ni/ /g.yas kyi phyag na bsnams par mdzad/ /snying gar sdigs mdzub zhags pa dang / /dril bu dgra sta g.yon pa na/ g.yon brkyang pa yi gnas pa yis/ /mi bzad bgegs ni skrag mdzad pa/ /pad+ma nyi ma mnan nas ni/ /lho yi phyogs na bzhugs par gyur/ /rang sngags yi ge las byung ba'i/ /'dod chags mgon po mi g.yo ba/ /spyan gsum pad+ma rA ga'i mdog /zhal ni dmar dang gnag dang dkar/ /zhal gdangs gsus khyim che ba dang / /'od dpag med pa'i cod pan can/ /dpa' bo g.yon brkyang pa yis gnas/ /'bar ba'i tshogs ni rnam par 'khrugs/ /pad+ma ral gri gtun shing ni/ /g.yas kyi phyag na bsnams par mdzad/ /snyems dang bcas pas dril bu dang / /dgra sta zhags pa g.yon na bsnams/ /pad+ma nyi ma la gnas te/ /phyogs bcu dag tu gzigs nas ni/ /klu rnams skrag par mdzad nas su/ /nub kyi phyogs su bzhugs par gyur/ /

28
081-14b rang sngags sa bon las byung ba'i/ /phrag dog mi g.yo mgon po ni/ /don yod rdo rje'i dbu rgyan can/ /sngo ljang ut+pal 'dab ma'i mdog /zhal ni sngo dang dmar dang dkar/ /zhal gdangs la ni rnam par 'gyur/ /gsus khyim che zhing spyan gsum pa/ /'bar ba'i 'od kyis rnam par brgyan/ /sna tshogs rdo rje 'khor lo dang / /gtun shing rnams ni g.yas pa na/ /sdigs mdzub zhags pas phyag mtshan cing / /dril bu dgra sta g.yon na bsnams/ /g.yon brkyang ba yis gnas pa yis/ /pad+ma nyi ma mnan nas ni/ /phyogs bcu dag tu gzigs nas ni/ /bgegs chen 'jigs pa bsal mdzad nas/ /byang gi phyogs su bzhugs par gyur/ /de ltar phyogs bcu'i bgegs kyi tshogs/ /mthar byed rab tu zad mdzad nas/ /sems can yongs su btul byas te/ /zhing rnams sangs rgyas tshogs kyis bkang / /'phags pa mi g.yo ba'i rtag pa las byung ba'i dkyil 'khor bkod pa'i le'u ste lnga pa rdzogs so// //
